dublin_core.dcvalue: The Food and Drug Administration FDA is expected to grant accelerated approval to a new formulation of saquinavir this fall The older formulation Invirase is dangerously weak Fortovase is more powerful and studies have shown that it is effective when used in combination with AZT 3TC and Crixivan A small pediatric trial also showed viral load dropping below detectable levels A phone number is included for further information on the new drug
Positively aware : the monthly journal of the Test Positive Aware Network
